snippet: Finally coming to terms with the enormity of its TB problem, India is preparing a radical overhaul and expansion of its national treatment program....
abstract: India will significantly expand its program for treating tuberculosis after release of World Health Organization study that estimates country hosts more than quarter of world's TB patients; remedy for ancient and long-curable lung disease had not been reaching private sector patients, which are overwhelming majority in India.
lead_paragraph: Finally coming to terms with the enormity of its TB problem, India is preparing a radical overhaul and expansion of its national treatment program.

headline.main: ‘True Scale’ of India’s Tuberculosis Problem: 2.8 Million New Cases
headline.print_headline: Scale of TB in India: 2.8 Million New Cases
